* Sun Jul 12 2009 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.1.5
- NameChooserSafe are used to choose name in containers now;
- Searching by dictionary keyword ignores spaces now;
- Searching by 'name' involve search by title;
- Searching by title ignores spaces and register.

* Thu Feb 12 2009 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.1.4
- Display "None" in empty author field fixed;
- Converter  LightReST is in use now;
- News order fixed;
- Some components moved into plugins;

* Fri Oct 24 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.1.3
- Dependences fixed;
- A few bugs fixed;
- KS Interface switcher excluded;

* Tue Oct 21 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.1.2
- Profile support added;
- Community support added;
- FriendShip added;
- Some RSS errors fixed;
- InterfaceSwitcher will not used any more;
- Dependencies updated;

* Thu Jun 26 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.1.1
- Dependences are cleaned from stale items
- Rubricator excluded from standard package set
- Remotefs excluded from standard package set

* Sat Apr 05 2008 Andrey Orlov <dbdt@dreambot.ru> 1.1.0
- Annotation switcher added to remote article
- Requires changed
